items.sentence: Let\'s hope Tom didn\'t do what you think he did.
Tom said he didn\'t want a party on his birthday.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go to Boston with me.
Tom said he doesn\'t even want to think about it.
I wish I could remember where I left my umbrella.
I wish that Tom had come to our party last night.
I know you\'re not planning on staying in Boston.
Our parents live right across the street from us.
I asked Tom if any of his sisters were unmarried.
That\'s exactly what I want to talk to you about.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will swim.
Do you consider yourself a fluent French speaker?
Those who know me know I\'m pretty good at chess.
I just hope Tom stays awake until Mary gets home.
The door swung open and Tom walked into the room.
When I got off the train, I saw a friend of mine.
We have to make sure that we never do this again.
Tom and I are planning to go to Boston next fall.
I know Tom and Mary are both allergic to peanuts.
Tom pretended that he didn\'t know Mary was rich.
